General.Name: L Catterton Asia Acquisition Corp Unit
General.Description: L Catterton Asia Acquisition Corp does not have significant operations. It focuses on effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It focuses on acquiring business in the consumer technology sectors in Asia. L Catterton Asia Acquisition Corp was incorporated in 2021 and is headquartered in Singapore.
